title: Endeavor Formally Drops Its IPO Plans
text:
Endeavor Group Holdings Inc.—the company behind the Miss Universe Pageant, Ultimate Fighting Championship and the largest talent agency in Hollywood—formally withdrew plans for an initial public offering.

In a filing Wednesday with the Securities and Exchange Commission, California-based Endeavor didn’t give a reason for the about-face. The Wall Street Journal previously reported that Endeavor had shelved its IPO plans late last month, a day before it was to begin trading, in part given the disappointing trading debut of Peloton...
description: Endeavor Group Holdings Inc.—the company behind the Miss Universe Pageant, Ultimate Fighting Championship and the largest talent agency in Hollywood—formally withdrew plans for an initial public offering.
